title: Value Stream Domain Schema
description: Schema for end-to-end flow of activities that deliver value to customers and stakeholders

valueStream.description: A sequence of activities that collectively deliver value to a stakeholder or customer

title.description: The name or title of the Value Stream

description.description: A detailed explanation of what the Value Stream entails

purpose.description: The intended purpose or function of the Value Stream within the Organization

owner.description: The individual or team responsible for the Value Stream

orgUnitTitle.description: The Organization unit(s) to which the Value Stream is linked

performanceIndicators.description: Metrics used to measure the effectiveness and efficiency of the Value Stream

dependencies.description: Other capabilities, processes or systems that the Value Stream depends on

relatedValueStreams.description: Value streams that are related or linked to this Value Stream

maturityLevel.description: The current maturity level of the Value Stream

toolsAndTechnologies.description: Tools and technologies used to support or enable the Value Stream

complianceAndStandards.description: Regulatory requirements and standards the Value Stream must adhere to

cost.description: The financial cost associated with implementing and maintaining the Value Stream

risks.description: Potential risks associated with the Value Stream and its operations

improvementOpportunities.description: Areas where the Value Stream can be enhanced or improved

strategicAlignment.description: How the Value Stream aligns with the Organization's strategic goals and objectives

valueStreamStage.description: Sequential steps or phases within a value stream that contribute to value transformation

stageTitle.description: Name/title of the Value Stream stage

parentValueStream.description: The Value Stream it belongs to

valueItems.description: Specific outputs or benefits generated in the stage

purpose.description: Intended function within the Value Stream
